title: Australian Demographic Data Bank
text: R package containing state-level demographic data Australia. used conjunction demography package. Smith, L. (2009) Australian Demographic Data Bank, 1901-2003: Populations [Computer File]. Canberra: Australian Social Science Data Archive, Australian National University, 2009. Smith, L. (2009) Australian Demographic Data Bank, 1901-2003: Deaths [Computer File]. Canberra: Australian Social Science Data Archive, Australian National University, 2009. Thanks Len Smith providing data.

title: Australian Demographic Data Bank
text: can install package using

title: Australian fertility data — aus.fertility
text: Age-specific fertility rates female child-bearing population Australia.

title: Australian fertility data — aus.fertility
text: Object class demogdata containing following components: year Vector years age Vector ages rate List containing one matrix one age group per row               one column per year. pop Population data form rate. type Type object. case, “fertility”. label Character string giving area data taken.                case, “Australia”.

title: Australian fertility data — aus.fertility
text: Australian fertility rates populations (1921-2006) single year age groups (15-49) provided Australian Bureau Statistics. population numbers 2002 onwards differ slighly australia (mortality) object. population numbers aus.fertility updated latest ABS estimates.

title: Australian fertility data — aus.fertility
text: Rob J Hyndman

title: Mortality and population data — data
text: Mortality rates populations Australia Australian states. data can plotted modelled using functions demography package plot.demogdata fdm.

title: Mortality and population data — data
text: data demogdata objects containing following components: year Years data available age Ages data available rates list matrix components female, male total one age group                  per row one column per year. pop list form rates containing population numbers instead mortality rates. type character string equal "mortality" case. label character string giving geographical region.

title: Mortality and population data — data
text: Smith, L. (2009) Australian Demographic Data Bank, 1901-2003: Populations [Computer File]. Canberra: Australian Social Science Data Archive, Australian National University, 2009. Smith, L. (2009) Australian Demographic Data Bank, 1901-2003: Deaths [Computer File]. Canberra: Australian Social Science Data Archive, Australian National University, 2009.

title: Mortality and population data — data
text: following data sets included: data v3.2b Australian Demographic Data Bank released 10 February 2005.

title: Mortality and population data — data
text: Rob J Hyndman

title: Version 3.225
text: Added pkgdown support (19 June 2017)

title: Version 3.224
text: change data. Updated package structure required Rv3.3.3. (April 2017)

title: Version 3.223 (29 October 2010)
text: Updated documentation include full citations Smith (2009) references.

title: Version 3.222 (22 April 2008)
text: Updated aus.fertility 2006.

title: Version 3.221 (5 September 2006)
text: Added namespace hide .onAttach

title: Version 3.22 (17 May 2005)
text: female population numbers previously identical male population numbers. now fixed. fertility rates now given per 1000 women consistent aus.fert data demography package. (previously rates per woman).

title: Version 3.21 (16 May 2005)
text: state code corrupted. now fixed. 1x1 version Australian fertility data now included.
